comments.author: Mazhar I.Mahmood
comments.content:
Its very nice video, wish there was another one. This is the real place to test Cruisers and Jeeps. They are ment to be driven on this type of terrain. The vedio clips, were shot very professionaly, I mean at the interesting moments. Keep up the good work.

Mazhar. USA.

comments.content:

I am great fan offroad pakistan club. whenever i a want to enjoy offroading experience i watch your picture gallery.

Great work Guys! Keep it up

Wajhi.

from Lahore

comments.content: Good editing & work like a National Geographic Films

comments.author: Ahmad Arif
comments.content: Visiting your web for the first time. The video, maker and the commentator have done real professional work. An interesting, informative and thrilling web. Very well done.

comments.author: Khurram Khan
comments.content:
It was a great video, infect I have seen it twice, I am sure you guys had good fun.

I was just wondering how can I join you guys for next trip, since I am also found of offroading and have a Jeep (Prado)

Regards,

Khurram

comments.author: Cajetan
comments.content:
Extremely amazing video,

Can anybody guide me how to join you guys for the next trip, as i have a toyota Surf and am quite keen of offroading, i have two more experienced guys with me

also would appreciate an advise on whether it is advisable to install in winch in my surf or not, and also how to put it in the 4×4 mode, as its an automatic and it my first experience with a jeep.

comments.author: syed javed husain shah
comments.content:
MASTERPIECE. THANK YOU FOR RENEWING MY MEMORIES OF THAR DESERT. THIS IS THE AREA I FOUGHT THE 1971 WAR AGAINST INDIA.

I WAS COMMANDING A FEW COMPANYS OF MUJAHIDS 100MILES NORTHWEST OF HATHUNGO. I LIVE IN USA NOW AND WAS A OFF ROAD FANATIC.

ENJOY YOUR COUNTRY AND NATURE AND TO ALL OF YOU THANK YOU AGAIN FOR THIS WONDERFULL VIDEO.

comments.author: safeer haider
comments.content:
WOW……that is all i have to say.

What a wonderful masterpiece….my first time to check your website and i am amazed…I am buying a CJ7 soon inshallah.

Great camera work and editing. You guys Rock…

comments.author: Hamid Hashmi
comments.content: It is amazing video and I had an experienced this kind of adventure in late 90’s. When I saw Dr. Mansur Ahmad and his narration is so interesting that I would like be member of your club. Please do you email me your video on Thar desert expedition.

comments.author: SAM
comments.content:
Awesome work! I enjoyed each and every second of the movie. I don’t know whether I am right or wrong but I expect lot more support from jeeps that was missing in this movie… but at the same time my love to buy a jeep is now sky high. Just looking for good vehicle and above all to convince my dad

Can I ask one thing! the guy in Parado in back seat (with blue shirt). Why he joined the trip if he don’t want to come out of jeep? In video, he was in jeep all the time….I m really sorry but I don’t like that

On spot fixing of wheel puncher was really very interesting. But I wonder how they fill ups the air…Is it from other spare wheel?

Thumbs up for the guy who fixed the Radiator. !

Keep it up!

comments.author: Murtaza Razvi
comments.content: Great filming. Lovely landscape and adventure. Thanks for putting it up.

comments.author: Muhammad Saad Mubeen
comments.content: Well I saw ur video….Its the best among the lot. Very professional work. This video also enhanced my passion of off road driving….but dont have money for all that stuff .

comments.author: Agha Aurangzaib
comments.content:
Thumbs up! nice video, you can add traditional thar music on the background to give it a lively touch, do letme know if i can join the adventure,

Take care

comments.content: its very nice video i love it
